sen.j: 株式会社京都ホテル（きょうとホテル）は、京都府京都市中京区に本社を置くホテル運営会社。
sen.e: The Kyoto Hotel, Ltd., with its head office in Nakagyo Ward of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a company that runs hotels.
The Kyoto Hotel, Ltd., with its head office in Nakagyo Ward of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a company that runs hotels.
The Kyoto Hotel, Ltd., with its head office in Nakagyo-ku Ward of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a company that runs hotels.

sen.j: 主要施設「京都ホテルオークラ」は京都を代表する老舗ホテルの一つである。
sen.e: Its main facility 'Kyoto Hotel Okura' is a long-established leading hotel in Kyoto.
Its main facility 'Kyoto Hotel Okura' is a long-established leading hotel in Kyoto.
Its main facility 'Kyoto Hotel Okura' is a long-established leading hotel in Kyoto.

sen.j: 京都ホテルオークラ
sen.e: Kyoto Hotel Okura
Kyoto Hotel Okura
Kyoto Hotel Okura

sen.j: 京都ホテルオークラの起源は神戸の実業家、前田又吉が1888年に川端通二条通で創業した旅館「京都常盤」である。
sen.e: Kyoto Hotel Okura has its origin in Kyoto Tokiwa Ryokan which was founded at Kawabata-dori Nijo-dori Street by Matakichi MAEDA, a businessman of Kobe, in 1888.
sen.cmt: 京都常盤→Kyoto Tokiwa Ryokan（京都常盤）[定訳不明]
sen.e: Kyoto Hotel Okura has its origin in Kyoto Tokiwa Ryokan which was founded at Kawabata-dori Nijo-dori Street by Matakichi MAEDA, a businessman of Kobe, in 1888.
Kyoto Hotel Okura has its origin in Kyoto Tokiwa Ryokan which was founded at Kawabata-dori Street Nijo-dori Street by Matakichi MAEDA, a businessman of Kobe, in 1888.

sen.j: 前田は旧勧業場跡地（現所在地である河原町通御池通）の払い下げを受け、1890年に洋風木造建築の「常盤ホテル」を日本土木会社（現・大成建設）の施工で竣工、開業させた。
sen.e: Maeda bought from the government the vacant lot (Oike-dori of Kawaramachi, where the hotel stands now) of defunct Kangyo-jo (the Commercial and Industrial Promotion Center), where he had Dai Nippon Construction (now Taisei Corporation) construct a Western style wooden hotel building 'Tokiwa Hotel' and started business in1890.
sen.cmt: 「勧業場」の訳については，(http://ci.nii.ac.jp/naid/110002365903)京都勧業場の説明の参考(http://www.joho-kyoto.or.jp/~wazaden/sakigake/020.html)
sen.e: Maeda bought from the government the vacant lot (Oike-dori of Kawaramachi, where the hotel stands now) of the defunct Kangyo-jo (the Commercial and Industrial Promotion Center), where he had Dai Nippon Construction (now Taisei Corporation) construct a Western style wooden hotel building 'Tokiwa Hotel' and started business in1890.

Maeda bought from the government the vacant lot (Kawaramachi-dori Street Oike-dori Street, where the hotel stands now) of the defunct Kangyo-jo (the Commercial and Industrial Promotion Center), where he had Dai Nippon Construction (now Taisei Corporation) construct a Western style wooden hotel building 'Tokiwa Hotel' and started business in1890.

sen.j: 常盤ホテルは1894年に井上喜太郎によって買収され、平安遷都1100年記念式典の行われる1895年に「京都ホテル」として営業を再開。
sen.e: Yoshitaro INOUE bought Tokiwa Hotel in 1894, and he resumed its hotel business in 1895, when the ceremony of the 1100th anniversary of the foundation of Heian-kyo was held.
sen.cmt: 井上喜太郎→Yoshitaro INOUE[読み不明] 「きたろう」か，「よしたろう」，か不明です．
sen.e: Yoshitaro INOUE bought Tokiwa Hotel in 1894, and in 1895 he resumed the operation of the hotel when the ceremony of the 1100th anniversary of the foundation of Heian-kyo was held.

Yoshitaro INOUE (井上喜太郎) bought Tokiwa Hotel in 1894, and in 1895 he resumed the operation of the hotel when the ceremony of the 1100th anniversary of the foundation of Heian-kyo (the ancient capital of Japan in current Kyoto) was held.
sen.cmt: 読む不明の漢字などを補足しました。

sen.j: 1928年には鉄筋コンクリート構造・7階建ての新館が清水建設の設計・施工で完成した。
sen.e: In 1928, its new ferroconcrete seven-storey building, designed and constructed by Shimizu Corporation, was completed.
In 1928, the new ferroconcrete seven-storey building, designed and constructed by Shimizu Corporation, was completed.
In 1928, the new ferroconcrete seven-storey building, designed and constructed by Shimizu Corporation, was completed.

sen.j: 1991年12月、総合設計制度の適用を受け60mの高層ビル「京都ホテルおいけ本館」の建設に着手、1994年に竣工した。
sen.e: It started constructing 'Kyoto Hotel Oike Honkan,' a sixty-meter high rise building, in 1991 under the Comprehensive Design System, and completed it in 1994.
He started constructing the 'Kyoto Hotel Oike Honkan,' a sixty-meter high rise building, in 1991 under a Comprehensive Design System, and completed it in 1994.
He started constructing the 'Kyoto Hotel Oike Honkan,' a sixty-meter high rise building, in December 1991 under a Comprehensive Design System, and completed it in 1994.

sen.j: このホテル改築をめぐっては京都の景観を破壊するとの反対意見も根強く、激しい論争が繰り広げられた。
sen.e: There were persistent opposing opinions against the rebuilding of the hotel saying it would destroy the beautiful scenery of Kyoto, and heated debates took place.
There was persistent opposition against the rebuilding of the hotel saying it would destroy the beautiful scenery of Kyoto, and heated debates took place about it.
There was persistent opposition against the rebuilding of the hotel saying it would destroy the beautiful scenery of Kyoto, and heated debates took place about it.

sen.j: 2001年に京都ホテルは経営再建策の一環としてホテルオークラとの業務提携を決定、2002年にオークラホテルズ&リゾーツに加盟して本館の名称を「京都ホテルオークラ」に改めた。
sen.e: In 2001, Kyoto Hotel decided to go into business tie-up with Hotel Okura as one of its management restructuring measures, and became a member of Okura Hotels & Resorts in 2002 to rename is main building 'Kyoto Hotel Okura.'

In 2001, Kyoto Hotel decided to tie-up with Hotel Okura as one of its management restructuring measures, and became a member of Okura Hotels & Resorts in 2002 and renamed the main building 'Kyoto Hotel Okura.'

In 2001, Kyoto Hotel decided to tie-up with Hotel Okura as one of its management restructuring measures, and became a member of Okura Hotels & Resorts in 2002 and renamed the main building 'Kyoto Hotel Okura.'

sen.e: Opened on March 6, 1895

sen.j: 株式会社京都ホテルは1927年に設立。
sen.e: The Kyoto Hotel, Ltd. was founded in 1927.
The Kyoto Hotel, Ltd. was founded in 1927.
The Kyoto Hotel, Ltd. was founded in 1927.

sen.j: 1969年10月に京都証券取引所に上場、2001年3月に大阪証券取引所市場第二部に上場した（大証・京証合併のため）。
sen.e: In October 1969, listed on the Kyoto Stock Exchange; and in March 2001, listed on the Second Section of the Osaka Securities Exchange (following the merger of these two markets)
In October 1969, listed on the Kyoto Stock Exchange; and in March 2001, listed on the Second Section of the Osaka Securities Exchange (following the merger of these two markets)
In October 1969, listed on the Kyoto Stock Exchange; and in March 2001, listed on the Second Section of the Osaka Securities Exchange (following the merger of these two markets)

sen.j: 1977年以降はニチレイが筆頭株主となり経営支援を続けていたが、2005年1月にホテルオークラが株式譲渡を受け筆頭株主になった。
sen.e: Nichirei Corporation had been assisting its management as the largest shareholder since 1977; and in January 2005, Hotel Okura obtained the stocks to become the top shareholder.
Nichirei Corporation had been assisting with management as the largest shareholder since 1977; and in January 2005, Hotel Okura obtained the majority of stocks to become the top shareholder.
Nichirei Corporation had been assisting with management as the largest shareholder since 1977; and in January 2005, Hotel Okura obtained the majority of stocks to become the top shareholder.

sen.j: 2004年3月に投資会社アセット・マネージャーズに売却。
sen.e: It was sold to an investment firm, Asset Managers Holdings Co. Ltd.
It was sold to an investment firm, Asset Managers Holdings Co. Ltd.
It was sold to an investment firm, Asset Managers Holdings Co. Ltd. in March 2004.

sen.j: 同年6月、アセット・マネージャーズが設立した、アセットオペレーターズが経営会社となり、運営をJALホテルズに委託、現在は「ホテル日航茨木 大阪」と改名。
sen.e: In the same year, MBK Operators established by Asset Managers Holdings took over the hotel, and entrusted its management to JAL Hotels which renamed it 'Hotel Nikko Ibaraki Osaka.'
In the same year, MBK Operators established by Asset Managers Holdings took over the hotel, and entrusted its management to JAL Hotels which renamed it 'Hotel Nikko Ibaraki Osaka.'
In June of the same year, MBK Operators established by Asset Managers Holdings took over the hotel, and entrusted its management to JAL Hotels which renamed it 'Hotel Nikko Ibaraki Osaka' today.
